reviews.review: Literally a terrible game with nothing but loading bars for game play. The devs probably sat down and said "How do we get creative with a game" and another said "Oh we don't" and thus this abysmal dumpster fire of a game was born.

if you're a new player you're going to be face-camped constantly, it's a low-iq move on part of the killer, but that doesn't stop it from ruining the game.  I'd suggest a penalty for hook camping or a freeze on the hook timer progress, but the DEV team doesn't seem interested in addressing this.

the thing about this game is, if you take it seriously and try to do all the most meta shit you can, you aren't going to have fun. people treat this game like its actually life or death and i feel like that takes away from the experience quite a bit.. competetiveness is important for a game like this to survive but if you always take this game seriously you will want to kill yourself thats just what happens

This game is.... fun? Don't get me wrong, it CAN be good, but... it's a gamble. You might play 3 games and have fun, but the more repetitive and cheap it gets, the less balanced the game is, so most of your future gameplay will be Devastating victories or devastating defeats, there's no place in this mess for an in-between.

The game is quite fun and somewhat addicting even though its repetitive. 

The concept is good, the characters and outfits are nice, you can also play as famous characters from actual horror movies or other spooky games and being able to play with friends is always a very fun thing to do.

Honestly, the only issues i have with the game is that there is a lot of bugs and game/character balancing issues, so that definitely needs to get fixed but other than that the game is pretty decent.
I think the game is good but its just not as fun as I remembered it back then
